title: The Impact of Social Media on Student Learning
author: Maria Santos
subject: Social Science
abstract: This study examines how social media usage affects academic performance among senior high school students.

title: Climate Change Awareness Among Youth
author: Juan Dela Cruz
subject: Environmental Science
abstract: Research on the level of environmental awareness and attitudes towards climate change among high school students.

title: Effects of Sleep Deprivation on Academic Performance
author: Ana Reyes
subject: Health Science
abstract: An investigation into how sleep patterns affect test scores and learning retention.
